UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structural and biological characterization of shortened derivatives of the cathelicidin PMAP-36.
Literature.Author: Biondi B, de Pascale L, Mardirossian M, Di Stasi A, Favaro M, Scocchi M, Peggion C

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:65% Hemolysis=32 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:100% Cell death=64 µM
